statements: UPDATE CustomerPreferences SET age = 30, name = 'John Doe' WHERE customer_id = 101;
UPDATE BookingHistory SET total_price = 1500.00, destination = 'Paris' WHERE booking_id = 201;
UPDATE CustomerPreferences SET age = 30, gender = 'Male' WHERE customer_id = 101;
UPDATE BookingHistory SET total_price = 1500.75, destination = 'Paris' WHERE customer_id = 101 AND booking_date = '2022-05-10';
UPDATE customer_preferences SET email='new_email@example.com', phone_number='1234567890', name='John Doe' WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE booking_history SET total_amount=100.50, booking_date='2022-01-15', customer_id=2 WHERE booking_id=3;
UPDATE customer_preferences SET email = 'newemail@example.com', phone_number = '+1234567890' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE booking_history SET total_amount = 1500.75, booking_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE booking_id = 10;
UPDATE customer_preferences SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 123;
UPDATE travel_itineraries SET activities = 'Sightseeing, Hiking' WHERE itinerary_id = 456;
UPDATE customer_preferences SET name='John Smith', age=30 WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE booking_history SET amount_paid=1500.50, booking_date='2022-07-15' WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE customers SET phone_number = '+1234567890', full_name = 'John Doe' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE destinations SET description = 'A beautiful tropical island', price_per_person = 1500.00 WHERE destination_id = 3;
UPDATE customers SET phone_number='555-1234' WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE destinations SET price_per_person=200.00, description='Beautiful beach destination' WHERE destination_id=5;
UPDATE customer_preferences SET email = 'newemail@example.com', phone_number = '555-1234' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE booking_history SET amount = 1500.00, booking_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE booking_id = 5;
UPDATE customer_preferences SET preferred_destination = 'Europe', email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 12345;
UPDATE travel_itineraries SET start_date = '2022-09-15', destination = 'France' WHERE itinerary_id = 54321;
